body:
You wonâ€™t be able to continue with your application until you follow these steps.

- [Find a mediator]({app:urls:url:fmc_find-mediator}) and book a MIAM
- Attend the MIAM
- Ask the mediator for a certificate confirming your attendance
- Return to this application to continue

!abbr:MIAM!
heading:
You need to attend a MIAM and get a certificate
!abbr:MIAM!
